content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 22), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"初動は索敵重視。敵空母はマップ左上(3,3)近傍にいるため、こちらは空母をやや北西へ接近させつつ、航続距離を最大に生かして遠方索敵する。航空隊は別方向に発艦して索敵範囲を広げ、敵を早期発見する。発見優先で攻撃範囲外からの索敵を狙う。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":12,"y":19},"launch_target":{"x":5,"y":7}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (5, 7) while at (12, 19).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (13, 20), en route to target (12, 19), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (12, 19), outbound toward (5, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking":"空母は更に北西へ慎重に接近し索敵圏を拡大。BSQ1は(5,7)へ向かい索敵継続。BSQ2を別方向へ発艦して索敵面を広げ、敵空母の発見確率を上げる。発艦目標は左上領域の中心寄りに設定する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":11,"y":18},"launch_target":{"x":3,"y":5}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (10, 14) while at (12, 18).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 19) while at (12, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (10, 14) while at (10, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 19) while at (10, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (3, 5) while at (11, 17).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (10, 14) (previously at (10, 14)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (11, 19) (previously at (11, 16)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (12, 18), en route to target (11, 18), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (10, 16), outbound toward (10, 14), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 17), outbound toward (3, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母と敵航空隊を発見。BSQ1は既に敵空母へ向かっているので攻撃させる。空母は索敵優先でやや南へ下がりつつ味方航空隊の帰還を安全にする位置を取る。BSQ2は遠方索敵ルートのため発艦継続（変更なし）。敵機の動き次第で空母を更に移動させて被発見回避を図る。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":13,"y":19},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ1) while at (12, 18).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ1) causing 24 damage while at (12, 18).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (10, 14) while at (12, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 19) while at (10, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 19) while at (10, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (9, 12) while at (9, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (9, 12) while at (10, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (9, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (9, 12) (previously at (10, 14)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (11, 19) (previously at (11, 16)), HP 18/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (12, 18), en route to target (13, 19), HP 76/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (9, 13), engaging an enemy target at (9, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (10, 13), outbound toward (9, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母を発見し、BSQ1が交戦中。BSQ2も敵空母へ向かっているため集中攻撃で早期撃沈を狙う。空母は被弾でHPが減っているため後退して敵の直接索敵圏外に入りつつ、味方機の帰還を安全にする位置を取る。敵機（ASQ1）はまだ生存しており脅威なので、発見位置から遠ざかるよう空母を南東へ移動させる。BSQ1・BSQ2の攻撃継続は機体任せなので発艦指示なし。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":14,"y":20},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (9, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 21 damage while at (9, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (9, 13).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (10, 16) while at (12, 19).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (12, 15) while at (13, 19).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (9, 15) while at (9, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (12, 15) while at (9, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (9, 12) while at (9, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (9, 15) while at (9, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (9, 11).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (9, 12) (previously at (10, 14)), HP 77/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (9, 15) (previously at (11, 16)), HP 18/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (12, 15) (previously at (11, 12)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (13, 19), en route to target (14, 20), HP 76/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (9, 13), returning to the carrier, HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (9, 11), engaging an enemy target at (9, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母に2波で大きなダメージを与えたが、敵航空隊2個が近くに残存。BSQ1が被弾して帰投中、BSQ2が交戦中のため空母は安全圏へ更に後退しつつ対空支援を行う。まずBC1は南東へ退避して敵索敵圏から外れる。帰還中のBSQ1を着艦させ、BSQ2の攻撃継続を許可。追加の索敵や攻撃は敵機の位置を見て次ターン判断する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":15,"y":21},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (9, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ2) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 12 damage while at (9, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (9, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (8, 13) while at (10, 15).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (8, 13) while at (9, 11).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (13, 19) while at (14, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (9, 12) while at (11, 17).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (13, 19) while at (11, 17).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (9, 12) (previously at (10, 14)), HP 54/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (13, 19) (previously at (11, 12)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 21), en route to target (15, 21), HP 76/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 17), returning to the carrier, HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (9, 11), returning to the carrier, HP 28/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母はHP54でこちらの航空隊は両方帰投中。敵機ASQ2が近く（13,19）にいるため着艦時に被弾リスクあり。まずは空母をやや南東へ移動して敵索敵圏から離脱しつつ、着艦安全圏を確保する。回復したら両機を再発艦し集中攻撃で撃沈を狙う。今回は着艦優先で発艦指示なし。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":16,"y":22},"launch_target":null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=16 y=22 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=15 y=21.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking":"前回の移動目標が陸地に設定されていたため修正。空母は安全に南東へ退避しつつ、着艦時の対空被害を避ける位置（海上）を取る。発艦は着艦完了後の状況を見て決定する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":15,"y":21},"launch_target":null}}

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 15), returning to the carrier, HP 28/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking":"敵空母は南西寄り(8,11)へ移動。敵ASQ2が近接しており着艦時に被弾リスクがあるため、空母はやや北へ移動して着艦安全圏を確保する。両機は着艦後に速やかに再発艦して敵空母を集中攻撃する予定。まずは着艦優先で発艦指示は出さない。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":15,"y":19},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ2) while at (15, 21).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ2) causing 26 damage while at (15, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (15, 22) while at (14, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ1) landed on the carrier while at (15, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (15, 22) while at (13, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (8, 11) (previously at (10, 14)), HP 54/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (15, 22) (previously at (11, 12)), HP 26/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (13, 19), returning to the carrier, HP 28/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母は西寄り(8,11)に残る。こちらは着艦済み機があるため、迅速に再発艦して敵空母を撃沈するチャンスを狙う。ただし敵機ASQ2(15,22)が近くにいるので、発艦方向は分散して被弾を避けつつ索敵範囲を重ねる。BC1は現在HP50なので一旦やや南へ下がり、敵索敵圏から外れつつ航続可能範囲内で再発艦支援を行う。BSQ1を敵空母方向へ直接発艦、BSQ2も同時に別経路で発艦し集中攻撃を行う。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":15,"y":20},"launch_target":{"x":9,"y":12}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (14, 21) while at (14, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ2) landed on the carrier while at (15, 20).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (12, 19) while at (15, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (9, 12) while at (14, 19).

- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (8, 11) (previously at (10, 14)), HP 54/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (12, 19) (previously at (11, 12)), HP 26/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (15, 20), en route to target (15, 20), HP 50/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (14, 19), outbound toward (9, 12), HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 28/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母は西側に残留(8,11)。こちらはHPが半分で敵機も近いため無理せず索敵・待機→集中攻撃が有効。BSQ1は既に敵方向へ向かっているので継続。BSQ2を発艦して西側から包囲するように敵空母へ向かわせ、発見次第即攻撃させる。空母は現位置で着艦支援と対空を行い、敵機接近で被発見されたら次ターンに南へ後退して被害を抑える。","action":{"carrier_target":null,"launch_target":{"x":8,"y":11}}}

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (14, 19), outbound toward (8, 11), HP 28/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母は(8,11)付近に留まる模様。こちらの航空隊が接近中だが、敵ASQ2が周辺で活動しており着艦時・発艦時の被弾リスクがある。BC1は着艦支援と対空を維持できる位置に留まり、敵機接近で被発見されないよう慎重に少し南に下がる。航空隊は引き続き敵空母へ向かわせ集中攻撃する。発艦は現在不要。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":15,"y":22},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"敵空母は更に西南へ移動し(6,10)で潜在。敵機ASQ2が近接しているため、航空隊を最短で突入させ速やかに撃破を狙う。BSQ1は戦闘力やHPが低いが既に接近中、BSQ2は健在なので両機で同時攻撃を継続させる。空母は今位置（海上で安全）を維持し、着艦支援と対空を続ける。敵機が接近してきたら次ターンに南東へ退避して被発見回避する。今回は攻撃継続のため発艦指示不要。","action":{"carrier_target":null,"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"敵機の視界から一時的に消えた。BSQ1が交戦中でBSQ2が接近中なので集中攻撃で敵空母を撃沈する。空母は遠く安全な位置にいるためそのまま着艦支援を継続。BSQ2を敵座標へ向け継続発進（既に向かっているので継続）。追加の発艦は不要。","action":{"carrier_target":null,"launch_target":null}}
